memories.name: Infrastructure Expertise
memories.episode_body: Specializing in Terraform and infrastructure as code. Want to implement more observability and chaos engineering practices. Planning to get Kubernetes CKA certification.

memories.name: Isabel Gomez - Senior DevOps Engineer
memories.episode_body: Isabel Gomez is Senior DevOps Engineer on DevOps Team at TechFlow Solutions, reporting to Henry Brooks. Expert in infrastructure as code (Terraform), monitoring systems (Prometheus/Grafana), and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP). 5 years DevOps experience.

memories.name: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
memories.episode_body: All infrastructure defined in Terraform. Modules for: VPC networking, GKE clusters, Cloud SQL databases, Redis instances, load balancers. State stored in GCS bucket with locking. Using workspaces for staging/production environments. Code review required for infrastructure changes.

memories.name: Monitoring and Alerting Setup
memories.episode_body: Prometheus scrapes metrics from all services. Grafana dashboards for: service health, request rates, error rates, latency, resource usage. Alerts sent to Slack and PagerDuty. Key alerts: service down, high error rate (>5%), high latency (p95 >500ms), pod crashes.
